description: Deacon Frost is a fictional character appearing in Marvel Comics. He appears in The Tomb of Dracula and in the Blade limited series.In the comics, Deacon Frost was depicted as a tall white haired late middle aged gentleman with red eyes, and wearing 1860s Germany period clothing. His doppelg√§nger sported an accent and attire that suggested a Southern preacher.
name: Deacon Frost
